item.title: Intro to BumbleBeast
item.description: So, What is BumbleBeast? It is a milling machine first - a monsterously powerful one at that. But it does plenty more than the standard desktop mill. Visit our website to learn more about its features and attributes. Features Handles the Toughest Jobs It can machine aluminum alloys at optimal speeds and feeds, with accuracy of 25 microns (0.001 in.) or better. It has 5 axes of movement to reduce production time up to 90% for parts with multi-faced or organic features.
